index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF SOCIAL AND HEALTH SERVICES
summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing application for and execution of an agreement with he State of Washington - Department of Social and Health Services for financial assistance under the Social and Health Facilities Bond Issue Act to aid in acquisition and remodelling of "Sunrise House" to serve as the Central Area Senior Citizens Center and directing deposit of the proceeds of such agreement in the Emergency Fund as partial reimbursement for the appropriation made therefrom by Ordinance 104597.
